Barnaxus was more nimble, more exact, more careful and more effective in everything he did than any of the other golems that were built in the empire of Khrad'Ke-zun. For many hundred years, this giant did as he was told, when he was told, and always did it better than anyone else, dwarven or golem. Barnaxus works were the pride of the Empire, and, when the ice sheets smothered the world, the name and reputation of Barnaxus passed into legend.[PARAGRAPH:1]Perhaps it was this legendary status that meant that when, years after the Ice had pulled back and the Luchuirp embarked on their mission of rebuilding the Empire, a tall, weather-worn golem appeared at the gates of the capital, he was instantly recognized as the long-lost Barnaxus. For, surely, only a golem of such perfection and brilliance as Barnaxus could have survived so long without maintenance and protection? [PARAGRAPH:1]It quickly became clear that Barnaxus was unlike any other golem. Barnaxus did not "take orders." He cooperated, he discussed, and he made suggestions. Barnaxus was a thinking golem, a learning golem. No one could guess how he had managed to break the magical ties that bind a golem to the two-dimensional world of "order and execution", and nobody really expected that they would ever find out. When asked, Barnaxus merely said: "A man spoke to me in the wastes and I awoke," he would say no more. [PARAGRAPH:1]True, Barnaxus could do what he wished, but what he wished was to help the Luchuirp. He wished to help them rebuild the Empire, to recall what was forgotten, and to perfect what was remembered. He appeared to harbor a love for the Luchuirp that mirrored that of a doting father, with a hint of a patronizing air to some of his advice. And the Luchuirp, amazingly, instead of rankling at being "taught" by a golem, loved him back. He was their link to the past and an amazing store of knowledge. Golems, after all, never forget. But most important of all, Barnaxus also taught the golems. What Barnaxus learned, the other golems soon copied. [PARAGRAPH:1]And so it was that Barnaxus went from being the "King of the Golems" to being a true leader of golems and of dwarves.

TEXT.English: Bone Golem
TEXT.German: Knochengolem
TEXT.Italian: Golem D'Osso
TEXT.Spanish: Bone Golem

TEXT.English: The Age of Rebirth saw the first appearance of the Bone Golem. Each part must be carved entirely from one piece of bone or similar material, and only elephants, descended from the mammoths abundant in the Age of Winter, can provide adequate sized raw materials. Curiosity led the Luchuirp craftsmen to attempt these creations, however they become one of their favorite toys, as the bone absorbed their magic as no metal could, leading them to reanimate when defeated.

Neugier brachte die Luchuirp-Handwerker dazu, diese Schöpfungen auszuprobieren, und tatsächlich wurden sie zu einem ihrer beliebtesten Spielzeuge, da die Knochen ihre Magie besser als jedes Metal aufsogen, was diese dazu brachte, sich wieder zu beleben wenn sie besiegt wurden.

TEXT.English: Clockwork Golem
TEXT.French: Golem Mécanique
TEXT.German: Mechanischer Golem
TEXT.Italian: Golem Meccanico
TEXT.Spanish: Clockwork Golem

TEXT.English: It takes the fine tools of a Machinist shop and a sturdy metal such as iron or mithril to produce the intricate detail required in this masterpiece of Luchuirp construction, but the performance is remarkable. Tiny springs and gears plus careful enchantment spells give it reflexes that can rival even a wild beast, enabling the Clockwork golem to damage any units near its target once it gets going. Repairs are not covered by warranty, however, so it is advisable to bring along a dwarven adept for repairs.

Winzige Federn und Rädchen, zusammen mit vorsichtigen Verzauberungssprüchen, machen Reflexe möglich, die sogar mit denen eines wilden Tieres verglichen werden können, und die dem Mechanischen Golem einmal in Bewegung gesetzt erlauben, jede Einheit in der Nähe seines Ziels zu beschädigen.

Le riparazioni non sono garantite però, perciò è consigliabile farlo accompagnare da un'adepto nanico per ripararlo.

TEXT.English: Gargoyle
TEXT.German: Gargoyle
TEXT.Italian: Gargoyle
TEXT.Spanish: Gargoyle

TEXT.English: Most Luchuirp, like other practical dwarves, value form over function. Gargoyles, designed to perch upon city walls when not descending upon intruders, are an exception to this. Showing off the intricate detail the crafters are capable of, Gargoyles are expressive, often with demonic appearances, though some are comical as well. These are carved from stone or marble. A Luchuirp city is safer when protected by Gargoyles, and an intriguing place to wander through.

TEXT.English: Iron Golem
TEXT.German: Eisengolem
TEXT.Italian: Golem di Ferro
TEXT.Spanish: Iron Golem

TEXT.English: Iron Golems were the first golems made, early in the Age of Magic, and they remained the most common type of golem on Erebus even late into the Age of Magic when pestilence and plague made metal more reliable than flesh. Even in hearty times Iron Golems were superior to most fighting men, fusing Luchuirp fine craftsmanship with a sturdy, dependable metal.

Selbst in diesen Zeiten erwiesen sich Eisengolems als überlegen, eine Kombination aus der großen Kunstfertigkeit der Luchuirp und einem soliden, widerstandsfähigen Metall.
TEXT.Italian: I Golem di Ferro sono stati i primi ad essere stati costruiti, agli inizi dell'Era della Magia, e rimasero il tipo più comune di golem su Erebus sino alla fine di quell'era in cui pestilenze e malattie rendevano il metallo più affidabile della carne. Anche durante tempi migliori i Golem di Ferro erano superiori alla maggior parte dei combattenti, nati dalla fusione dell'abilità artigiana Luchuirp con un metallo resistente e affidabile.

TEXT.English: Mud Golem
TEXT.German: Tongolem
TEXT.Italian: Golem di Fango
TEXT.Spanish: Mud Golem

TEXT.English: Being small is perfect for living in caverns and surviving a harsh unending winter. Upon leaving their burrows to reclaim their place on the surface, however, the first project the Luchuirp engineers and enchanters began was constructing their mud golem workers. Taller than dwarves, and even elves and men, these constructs are able to labor day and night without complaint, with the strength of several men allowing for grand projects.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The mud golem was one of the first types of golems to be built by the Luchuirp. Mud is a plentiful resource, and is very easy to work with for even a beginner enchanter. Unfortunately, the same qualities which make mud easy to work with, make it bad in battle. As a result, the mud golem has minimal combat capabilities and is used for hard manual labor.

TEXT.English: Nullstone Golem
TEXT.German: Obsidiangolem
TEXT.Italian: Golem di Pietra Levigata
TEXT.Spanish: Nullstone Golem

TEXT.English: It was upon watching an armorer from a friendly neighboring civilization produce armor for their Knights that a Luchuirp enchanter had an epiphany. In the same manor that the forged armor deflected arrows, a properly shaped and sufficiently polished stone body might deflect spells sent its way. The experiment was more successful than the enchanter was prepared for. The Nullstone Golem deflects magical energy completely, often keeping spells intact and sending them in unpredictable directions. The first time a Nullstone Golem advanced on a group of well-prepared enemy mages, a nearby iron golem was rusted instead, three fireballs were returned towards their senders, and four passing cows were charmed.

Das Experiment war viel erfolgreicher, als es sich der Beschwörer jemals erträumt hatte. Der Obsidiangolem reflektiert magische Energie vollständig und sendet sie in unvorhersehbare Richtung wieder aus. Als ein Obsidiangolem zum ersten Mal einer Gruppe wohl gerüsteter feindlicher Magier gegenüber stand, wurde an seiner Stelle ein naher Eisengolem verrostet, drei Feuerbälle wurden an ihre Absender zurückgeschickt und vier vorbeilaufende Kühe wurden bezaubert.
TEXT.Italian: Fù osservando un'armaiolo di una civiltà vicina, che stava creando armature per dei Cavalieri, che un'incantatore Luchuirp ebbe un'illuminazione. Nella stessa maniera in cui un'armatura deflette le frecce un corpo di pietra adeguatamente levigata e angolata avrebbe potuto deflettere le magie lanciategli contro. L'esperimento ebbe più successo di quanto l'incantatore si aspettava. Il Golem di Pietra Levigata defletteva completamente l'energia magica, spesso mantenendo le magie intatte e facendogli prendere direzioni imprevedibili. La prima volta che un Golem di Pietra Levigata attaccò un gruppo di maghi nemici competenti un Golem di Ferro vicino si arrugginì al posto di quello di pietra levigata, tre palle di fuoco vennerò rispedite al mittente e quattro mucche vennerò charmate.
TEXT.Spanish: It was upon watching an armorer from a friendly neighboring civilization produce armor for their Knights that a Luchuirp enchanter had an epiphany. In the same manor that the forged armor deflected arrows, a properly shaped and sufficiently polished stone body might deflect spells sent its way. The experiment was more successful than the enchanter was prepared for. The Nullstone Golem deflects magical energy completely, often keeping spells intact and sending them in unpredictable directions. The first time a Nullstone Golem advanced on a group of well-prepared enemy mages, a nearby iron golem was rusted instead, three fireballs were returned towards their senders, and four passing cows were charmed.

TEXT.English: Starting with Magic Immune gives the Nullstone Golem an obvious use of defending cities against attackers who favor direct damage spells. They will also be better than their strength would predict against any unit that relies on strength of a specific type. Golem promotion gives them additional immunities, forcing foes to take them down head on.

TEXT.German: Seine Immunität gegen Magie macht den Obsidiangolem sehr nützlich bei der Verteidigung von Städten gegen Gegner, die direkte Schadenszauber bevorzugen. Er ist ebenfalls besser, als seine Stärke vermuten lässt, gegen Einheiten, deren Stärke auf einer bestimmten Affinität beruht. Die "Golem"-Beförderung verleiht ihm bestimmte Immunitäten und zwingt Feinde dazu, ihn im Kampf Mann gegen Mann zu besiegen.
TEXT.Italian: Iniziando con la promozione Immune alla Magia il Golem di Pietra Levigata è ovviamente molto utile per difendere una città da aggressori che ne fanno elevato uso per offendere. Sono anche più forti di quanto la loro forza non suggerisca contro qualsiasi unità che si affida a una forza di tipo specifico. La promozione Golem gli fornisce immunità aggiuntive obbligando i nemici ad affrontarlo direttamente.

TEXT.English: The novice Luchuirp crafters at the start of the age of rebirth tried working the exotic materials that their ancestors used, but found they needed more practice to get useful forms for their enchanting process. The wood golems produced by this practice turned out to make decent fighters, and could be found filling out the ranks amidst their sturdier relatives throughout the age.

Die aus diesen Versuchen entstandenen Waldgolems gaben passable Kämpfer ab und standen während des Zeitalters Seite an Seite mit ihren kräftigeren Verwandten.
TEXT.Italian: Gli artigiani novizi Luchuirp all'inizio dell'Era della Rinascita provarono a lavorare gli esotici materiali che venivano usati dai loro antenati, ma si resero conto che avevano bisogno di fare più pratica prima di poter ottenere delle forme utili per i loro processi di incantamento. I Golem di Legno creati per fare pratica si dimostrarono combattenti decenti, e vennerò usati per coprire i buchi nei ranghi dei loro cugini più resistenti.

TEXT.English: The Luchuirp's first golem unit, Wood golems are good as attackers or defenders, being stronger than the units most civs are likely to have access to at the same time. Like all golems, however, they cannot level up to gain promotions. Beware their vulnerability to fire.
TEXT.French: Premier golem des Luchuirps, les Golems de Bois sont de bons attaquants et défenseurs, plus forts que les unités que la plupart des civilisations ont accès au même moment. Comme tous les golems, il ne progressent pas et ne gagnent pas de promotions. Attention à leur vulnérabilité au feu.
TEXT.German: Die erste Golem-Einheit der Luchuirp, der Holzgolem, ist ebenso gut im Angriff wie in der Verteidigung und ist stärker als die Einheiten, die die meisten anderen Zivs zur selben Zeit normalerweise ausbilden können. Allerdings sammeln sie, wie alle Golems, keine Erfahrung. Pass auf ihre Schwäche gegen Feuer auf.
TEXT.Italian: La prima unità golem dei Luchuirp, i Golem di Legno sono dei buoni attaccanti e difensori essendo più forti delle unità che le altre civiltà dovrebbero avere nello stesso momento. Come tutti i golem però non possono ottenere livelli e promozioni. Fai attenzione alla loro vulnerabilità al fuoco.
